name: Raybind
description:
Description:

Co-op game in which you take on the role of robots capable to generate a deadly Tesla beams between themselvs. This beams - your only way to fight with enamies.

Note:

You can respawn after death if othre player picks up your corpse. After that you take control of the hologram phantom, which determins the place of your resurrection.

Control:

  • Pause: esc;
  • Yellow robot movement: WASD;
  • Yellow robot attack/respawn: Spacebar;
  • Orange robot movement: Arrows;
  • Orange robot attack/respawn: "0" on numpad.
